sn48.58:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate sukarakhatayam.
sn48.58:1.2: Tatra kho bhagava ayasmantam sariputtam amantesi:
sn48.58:1.3: “kim nu kho, sariputta, atthavasam sampassamano khinasavo bhikkhu tathagate va tathagatasasane va paramanipaccakaram pavattamano pavattati”ti?
sn48.58:1.4: “Anuttaranhi, bhante, yogakkhemam sampassamano khinasavo bhikkhu tathagate va tathagatasasane va paramanipaccakaram pavattamano pavattati”ti.
sn48.58:1.6: Anuttaranhi, sariputta, yogakkhemam sampassamano khinasavo bhikkhu tathagate va tathagatasasane va paramanipaccakaram pavattamano pavattati.
sn48.58:2.1: Katamo ca, sariputta, anuttaro yogakkhemo yam sampassamano khinasavo bhikkhu tathagate va tathagatasasane va paramanipaccakaram pavattamano pavattati”ti?
sn48.58:2.2: “Idha, bhante, khinasavo bhikkhu saddhindriyam bhaveti upasamagamim sambodhagamim,
sn48.58:2.7: Ayam kho, bhante, anuttaro yogakkhemo yam sampassamano khinasavo bhikkhu tathagate va tathagatasasane va paramanipaccakaram pavattamano pavattati”ti.
sn48.58:2.9: Eso hi, sariputta, anuttaro yogakkhemo yam sampassamano khinasavo bhikkhu tathagate va tathagatasasane va paramanipaccakaram pavattamano pavattatiti.
sn48.58:3.1: Katamo ca, sariputta, paramanipaccakaro yam khinasavo bhikkhu tathagate va tathagatasasane va paramanipaccakaram pavattamano pavattati”ti?
sn48.58:3.2: “Idha, bhante, khinasavo bhikkhu satthari sagaravo viharati sappatisso, dhamme sagaravo viharati sappatisso, sanghe sagaravo viharati sappatisso, sikkhaya sagaravo viharati sappatisso, samadhismim sagaravo viharati sappatisso.
sn48.58:3.3: Ayam kho, bhante, paramanipaccakaro yam khinasavo bhikkhu tathagate va tathagatasasane va paramanipaccakaram pavattamano pavattati”ti.
sn48.58:3.5: Eso hi, sariputta, paramanipaccakaro yam khinasavo bhikkhu tathagate va tathagatasasane va paramanipaccakaram pavattamano pavattati”ti.
